bibl.title: A Fragment of Choral Lyric (P. Oxy. 674).
bibl.note: Re-edition of P. Oxy. IV, 674 (= Pack2 1905). Probably early first century AD. The first editors suggested Pindaric authorship (cf. fr. dub. 338 Snell-Maehler), but in line 7 ἱαροῖς is not a Pindaric (or Bacchylidean) form.
bibl.seg: HORDERN James, A Fragment of Choral Lyric (P. Oxy. 674).

Re-edition of P. Oxy. IV, 674 (= Pack2 1905). Probably early first century AD. The first editors suggested Pindaric authorship (cf. fr. dub. 338 Snell-Maehler), but in line 7 ἱαροῖς is not a Pindaric (or Bacchylidean) form.
